inclusion.criterion: HCV RNA greater than or equal to10^4 IU/mL at Screening
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Confirmation of chronic HCV infection documented by either: A positive anti-HCV antibody test or positive HCV RNA or positive HCV genotyping test at least 6 months prior to the Baseline/Day 1 visit, or A liver biopsy performed within 12 weeks prior to the Baseline/Day 1 visit with evidence of chronic HCV infection.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Screening ECG without clinically significant abnormalities
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: ALT less than or equal to 10 times the upper limit of normal (ULN)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: AST less than or equal to 10 times ULN
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Direct bilirubin less than or equal to 1.5 ULN
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: HbA1c less than or equal to8.5%
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: eGFR greater than or equal to 60 mL /min, as calculated by the CKD-EPI equation.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Hemoglobin greater than or equal to 10g/dL
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Albumin greater than or equal to 3g/dL
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Current or prior history of any of the following: Clinically-significant illness (other than HCV) or any other major medical disorder that may interfere with subject treatment, assessment or compliance with the protocol; subjects currently under evaluation for a potentially clinically-significant illness (other than HCV) are also excluded.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Gastrointestinal disorder or post-operative condition that could interfere with the absorption of the study drug.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Difficulty with blood collection and/or poor venous access for the purposes of phlebotomy.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Clinical hepatic decompensation (i.e., ascites, encephalopathy or variceal hemorrhage).
exclusion.label: not_met
